code: import React,{useRef}from"react";import Button from"../UI/Button/Button";import{CottonLaundryStrategy}from"./LaundryStrategy.ts";import InputRef from"../UI/Button/InputRef";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var LaundryCotton=function LaundryCotton(props){var cottonPercentage=useRef();var cottonTemperature=useRef();function onClickHandler(event){event.preventDefault();var cottonStrategy=new CottonLaundryStrategy(props.weight,cottonPercentage.current.value,cottonTemperature.current.value);props.laundryContext.setStrategy(cottonStrategy);props.laundryContext.executeLaundry();cottonPercentage.current.value="";cottonTemperature.current.value="";}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputRef,{text:"Put cotton's percentage:",name:"cloPercentage",type:"number",ref:cottonPercentage}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputRef,{text:"Put choosen temperature:",name:"cloTemperatur",type:"number",ref:cottonTemperature}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:onClickHandler,children:"Check washing info"})]});};export default LaundryCotton;
